info.author: Douglas Paz
info.description:
================
Start With Aslam
================

Instalation
-----------

1. Install using pip:

    ``pip install start-with-aslam``

2. Configure ``settings.py``

    Required:

    .. code:: python

        INSTALLED_APPS = [
          'bootstrap3',
          'aslam.visitor',
          'aslam.ui',
        ]

        MIDDLEWARE = [
          'aslam.visitor.middleware.VisitorMiddleware',
        ]

        TEMPLATES = [
          {
            'OPTIONS': {
              'context_processors': [
                'aslam.visitor.context_processors.visitor_context_processor',
              ],
            },
          },
        ]

    Recommended:

    .. code:: python

        # Add this for use local Bootstrap static files below STATIC_URL is defined
        BOOTSTRAP3 = {
          'jquery_url': STATIC_URL + 'jquery-3.2.1.min.js',
          'base_url': STATIC_URL + 'bootstrap-3.3.7/',
        }

    Optional:

    .. code:: python

        # Aslam Settings

aslam.ui
--------

Configure Urls:

    Add aslam.ui.urls in your ROOT_URLCONF project file.

    .. code:: python
    
        from django.conf.urls import url, include

        from aslam.ui import urls as aslam_ui_urls

        urlpatterns = [
            url(r'^aslam/', include(aslam_ui_urls)),
        ]
info.name: start-with-aslam
